Decision.description: Decision is a result of evaluating a configuration policy which satisfies the specified predicates

deploy.description: a decision regarding deployment: True = require, False = forbid, Unknown = allow

policy.description: Descriptions of policies that have been used for evaluation

restrictions.description: Deployment restrictions on modules, clusters and additional resources

DecisionPolicy.description: DecisionPolicy is a justification for a policy that consists of a unique id, id of a policy set and a human readable desciption

Restriction.description: Restriction maps a property to a list of allowed values. Semantics is a disjunction of values, i.e. a type can be either plugin or config.

Restrictions.description: Deployment restrictions on modules, clusters and additional resources that will be added in the future

RuleDecisionList.description: A list of decisions per capability, e.g. {"read": {"deploy": "True"}, "write": {"deploy": "False"}}
